name: Ogo
description:
Ogo

Control Yin and Yang simultaneously through a challenging campaign full of varied levels with unique game mechanics. Skillful positioning decides on success and failure.

Your decision

Master powerful boss fights in the campaign or find relaxation in various endless game modes. Challenge yourself to beat your high score by taking risks, or play it safe and aim for flawless level completions.

Features:

  • Unique gameplay
  • Varied campaign
  • Challenging boss fights
  • Unlockable bonus levels
  • Relaxing endless game modes
  • High score system
  • Achievements
